flawed_nl_solution:
Silas paid half = 150/2 = <<150/2=75>>75
Remaining bill paid by 5 friends = 75 + 10% of 150 = 75 + 15 = 90
Each person will pay 1/5 which is 90/5 = <<90/5=18>>18
Each friend will pay $18=<<18=18>>18.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18.0, not 81.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
